## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Snape-max/TerminalMedia.git
cd imagecat
python install .
```

or

```bash
pip install TerminalMedia
```


## Requirements

- Python 3.6+
- Pillow for image reading
- opencv-python for videos


## Usage

```bash
icat <image_path> # display image
vcat <video_path> # display video
```
